n, m = map(int, input().split())

adj_list = [[] for _ in range(n)]

for _ in range(m):
    a, b = map(lambda x: int(x) - 1, input().split())
    adj_list[a].append(b)
    adj_list[b].append(a)

for i in range(n):
    print(len(adj_list[i]))

N,M = map(int,input().split())
roads = [[] for _ in range(N)]
for i in range(M):
    a,b = map(int,input().split())
    roads[a-1].append(b)
    roads[b-1].append(a)
for i in range(N):
    print(len(roads[i]))

N, M = map(int, input().split())

# 初期化
city_list = [0] * N

# 入力受け取り
for i in range(M):
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    city_list[a-1] += 1
    city_list[b-1] += 1

# 出力
for i in range(N):
    print(city_list[i])

N,M = map(int, input().split())

roads = [0] * (N+1)
for i in range(M):
    a,b = map(int, input().split())
    roads[a] += 1
    roads[b] += 1

for i in range(1,N+1):
    print(roads[i])

N, M = map(int, input().split())
roads = [0] * N

for i in range(M):
  a, b = map(int, input().split())
  roads[a - 1] += 1
  roads[b - 1] += 1

for i in range(N):
  print(roads[i])

N, M = map(int, input().split())

cities = [[] for _ in range(N)]
for i in range(M):
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    cities[a - 1].append(b - 1)
    cities[b - 1].append(a - 1)

for i in range(N):
    print(len(cities[i]))
